hadiths.text: Zaid b. Thabit (Allah be pleased with him) reported Allah's Messenger (may peace he upon him) having given concession in case of 'ariyya for selling dry dates (with) fresh dates after measuring them out

chapter.ara-name: باب تَحْرِيمِ بَيْعِ الرُّطَبِ بِالتَّمْرِ إِلاَّ فِي الْعَرَايَا
chapter.eng-name: The prohibition of selling fresh dates in exchange for dry dates except in the case of 'Araya
